description.displayText: Olga has been a wonderful part-time babysitter, taking care of our daughter from age 2 to 5. She made every moment fun and engaging, while also teaching her Russian and Ukrainian-a truly special gift. Her experience and positive energy made us feel completely at ease. We're so grateful for everything she's done for our family!
description.originalText: Olga has been a wonderful part-time babysitter, taking care of our daughter from age 2 to 5. She made every moment fun and engaging, while also teaching her Russian and Ukrainian-a truly special gift. Her experience and positive energy made us feel completely at ease. We're so grateful for everything she's done for our family!

description.displayText: Olga cared for our child for almost three wonderful years since he was three months old. Over this time, she became much more than a nanny-she truly became a cherished part of our family. Olga created and maintained a consistent and thoughtful routine, which gave our child a sense of security and structure. She ensured he was constantly learning, growing, and entertained, all while giving him an abundance of love and care. She consistently arrived early and was always flexible - whether we needed her after work hours, on weekends, or even overnight for our short getaways, she was always there to support us. It is rare to find someone as trustworthy, kind, and skilled as Olga. Our family is incredibly grateful for the impact she had on our lives.
